title: The Genie from downunder. - Vol. 4.
creator_credit: Australian Children's Television Foundation, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, Brendan Maher and Esben Storm
brief_description: Another two exciting episodes in this excellent series for children. In ‘Nobody’s perfect’, in an effort to stop Bruce from misinterpreting her wishes, Penelope writes down her perfect wish. In ‘Triple agent’, Conrad is convinced that Bruce may be a vampire or cyborg and tries to catch him out.
